tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    energy_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES energy_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyRates (
   rate_id UUID,
   rate DECIMAL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   provider_id UUID,
   type_id UUID,
   FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES EnergyProviders(provider_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES DeviceTypes(type_id)
) PRIMARY KEY (rate_id);
